messages.content: Who was it? I got here after it was deleted, and I'd like to read the comment history.
Have you tried having wealthy parents?
Do you have the voting link? I went on the NHL website but I didn't see anything.
I'm struggling to find what you're referring to here, could you maybe add something that points to it?
I cant wait. I'm curious if it will give us any more insight into the incident other than what we already know.
It is certainly interesting.....but is it anything?.....
You got any more of that weed?
We’ve bombed plenty of innocent people. How is it any different?
So she knows of 3 languages, Wonder what they are?
So which is more profitable for producers, brick n mortar or digital distribution? Which makes more money?
Why? You can tell me all about it.
Can you go see her in person?
Why's it called going into 86'ed mode though? I've never heard that before, it's interesting
Have you guys played Vancouver recently or has [NAME] found someone else to cut his hair?
This seems like a good as time as any to ask, what's some hype super robot stuff to check out? I've only ever seen Gurren.
When is the battle point for squad spawning back?
not writing some stats today [NAME]? just curious xD
What's the streamer's name? I want to find the aftermath of this
Hey, you ever watch the sopranos before?
That is interesting. Can you site some sources or anything on this matter ? I am genuinely intrigued .
What is everybody obsession with trading away young players in this sub?
How about a downvote for the update?
How many surprise Pikachu memes are we gonna have this episode? Like 6?
I wanna know about the sky being LCD! You ever hear the one about the [NAME] faking the return of [NAME]?
Did you noticed they removed my post? Yep.
How was the problem resolved??? Having the same issue????
Interesting. I wonder how does this work. Does it do swaps itself? Does it utilize the currency exchange listings? I'll check it out later.
Can anyone confirm the [NAME] likliness? Asking for a friend.
